Simple Blog Site

Jon Ellwood
Jon Ellwood
January 11, 2021

I was asked to create a very simple blog site where updates regarding a long term project could be posted. The requirements were that it be simple to use, fast to load, and allow users to add blog posts without assistance. I opted for a Gatsby site with Sanity as the CMS.

See the under construction project here
